glsa.title: Ansible: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities has been found in Ansible which may allow local privilege escalation.

background.p: Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Ansible. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ansible users should upgrade to the latest version:
